BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix broken test caused by setting old write index to read-only verified (#123190) #122887 set read-only on the source indices of a data stream reindex. To test behavior when the source index was already read-only, testDataStreamUpgrade sometimes set the old write index to read-only. But the rest end point for adding a read-only block always sets verifed-read-only. This caused the old write index to not need to be upgraded, resulting in an incorrect value for total_indices_requiring_upgrade
